stories.text:
I'm the founder/owner of an app called Cuff: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/cuff-video-chat-make-friends/id1514536428

and I'd like to sell it for $1M+. Wondering what the best place is to find people interested. Currently a fully passive product with 99% profit margins (only some server/hosting costs).

I'm wondering if I can ask for a large premium because of the very passive state of the app (produces $4k a month passively, all traffic organic).
stories.title: Who can I sell my app to for $1M+?
Cookie banners: G7 urged to consider solution to pop-up notices

stories.text:
For any HNers in biochem, how ridiculous was the idea of what they were selling? Blood tests with small amounts of blood doesn't strike me as impossible, but I don't know anything about the subject.

Is this closer to AMD Bulldozer or to me raising $BILLIONS for my "quantum-computer-in-this-box-you-cant-open"?
